data_table.description: Bone Mineral Density, Generation 3 Cohort Exam 2 between April 2010 and March 2011. Bone mineral density measurements were collected for the femur neck and trochanter and spine L2 to L4. Note: This is a partial set. To create a complete set of those data from Generation 3 Exam 2, merge this data set with t_bmdhs_2009_3_0627s and t_bmdhs_2010_3_0626s.

variable.comment: This is the average bone mineral density of variables S2L2BD, S2L3BD and S2L4BD.
